Package back.calculator

package back.calculator
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    back.calculator.operators
     
    back.calculator.types
     
  • Class
    Description
    App
    A very simple calculator in Java University of Mons - UMONS Software Engineering Lab Faculty of Sciences
    Calculator
    This class represents the core logic of a Calculator.
    ComplexForm
    Enumeration of the forms that a complex number can be represented in.
    Expression
    Expression is an abstract class that represents arithmetic expressions.
    ExpressionParser
    Main class for the parser of the calculator.
    IllegalConstruction
    Exception that will be used when an incorrectly constructed arithmetic expression is encountered.
    Main
    This class is necessary for the compilation of the .jar file.
    MySyntaxErrorListener
    MySyntaxErrorListener is a custom error listener that extends the BaseErrorListener class to handle syntax errors.
    Notation
    Enumeration of the 3 ways to represent an arithmetic expression as a String:
    Operation
    Operation is an abstract class that represents arithmetic operations, which are a special kind of Expressions, just like numbers are.
